     here. i'm probably gonna open it soon but look out, they have not been made yet. you can pre order them if you want, when i open the store. which may be tomorrow or maybe even today if i am feeling frisky

     ok i will

     a new year

     then life^2 would be 1764, that being said life does not =42

I seem to be in short supply and could use some assistance.

     i did not find it, i am actually still looking for it

12.12.17  8:13 pm   my hands are too small to play keyboard and guitar. With guitar I'm having difficulty with barre chords and chords where I need to reach more than three frets. for keyboard one hand barely spans an octave. I love music too much for it to completely stop me but practice isn't helping and I'm very frustrated. what am I supposed to do?

     you're going to have to think outside the box. keep in mind, django reinhardt had the wrong number of fingers, and michel petrucciani was about 3 feet tall and probably had very small hands also

12.12.17  8:01 pm   Would you say "bill wurtz" is the only accurate genre to be prescribed to your music?

     using an artist's name is always a great way to refer to their music. that's what names are for! i'm not sure if that answers your question

     t-shirts, but what else do you want

     you could try lifting weights with your abs, or just doing work around the house, using only your abs

12.12.17  4:07 pm   I just drove by a house that had two toilets in their front yard. Why could this be 

     they might have just changed religions. some religions do not allow toilets, so when a family converts to one of those religions they have to get rid of all their toilets

12.12.17  3:32 pm   does coffee taste better in ceramic or glass?

     what notes are in the song

And they're a part of society, groups of humans. you don't even have to tell these people to do it, they do it with the time and space they are given. it's really cool, you know?
